          <title>
            <string language="sl">Točka, premica, daljica, poltrak</string>
            <string language="en">Point, line, line segment, ...</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Punkt, Zeile, Strich...</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Point, ligne, ligne segment...</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ponto, linha, linha segmento...</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Punto, riga, riga segmento...</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σημείο, γραμμή, τμήμα μνήμης γραμμών...</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Punta, línea, línea segmento...</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Projekcija za spoznavanje osnovnih geo pojmov.</string>
            <string language="en">Presentation of basic geometry terms - point, line, line segment and simple exercise to revise them.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">premica</string>
            <string language="en">line</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">daljica</string>
            <string language="en">line segment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">točka</string>
            <string language="en">point</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">geometrija</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung der grundlegenden 
Geometriebezeichnungen - Punkt, Zeile, Strich und einfache Übung, zum
sie zu verbessern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation des limites de base de la 
géométrie - point, ligne, ligne segment et exercice simple pour les 
mettre à jour.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentação de termos básicos da geometria - 
ponto, linha, linha segmento e exercício simples para revisá-los.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentazione dei termini di base della geometria
- punto, riga, riga segmento ed esercitazione semplice per 
modificarla.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρουσίαση των βασικών όρων γεωμετρίας - σημείο, 
γραμμή, τμήμα μνήμης γραμμών και απλή άσκηση για να τους 
αναθεωρήσει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación de los términos básicos de la 
geometría - punta, línea, línea segmento y ejercicio simple para 
revisarlos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeile</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
